edu.usm.cos420.example1.service

Interface Service

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CustomerService, InventoryService

    public interface Service
    The Service Interface is based a design pattern which aims to organize the functionality of the application into logical units that are typically layered on top of much of the low level functionality of the application. This organization helps support service oriented architectures.
